sentences.en: Chinese company started building a highway northwards out of Accra.
sentences.cn: 一家中国公司着手建设自阿克拉向北的高速公司.

sentences.en: Europe's economic centre of gravity shifted northwards.
sentences.cn: 欧洲的经济重心向北移了.

sentences.en: From London we drove northwards to Birmingham.
sentences.cn: 我们从伦敦驱车向北开到伯明翰.

sentences.en: I have five letters on the way, moving northwards to China's inland.
sentences.cn: 我的五封信都在路上, 在向北的路途中,五个取向都插入中国的内陆.

sentences.en: Now cross the east bridge and then turn left ( northwards ).
sentences.cn: 现在穿过东面的桥然后左转 ( 朝北走 ).

sentences.en: One of these was slowly northwards.
sentences.cn: 其中一块向北慢慢地移去.

sentences.en: The coast sweeps ( away ) northwards in a wide curve.
sentences.cn: 海岸呈一大弧形向北伸展.

sentences.en: The coast sweeps northwards in a wide curve.
sentences.cn: 海岸向北方呈大弧形展开.

sentences.en: The liner, denied entry to the whole American continent, continued steaming northwards.
sentences.cn: 油轮在被拒绝进入整个美洲大陆之后, 继续驶向北方.

sentences.en: The path angled downhill and northwards.
sentences.cn: 小路向山下伸展，然后向北延伸。

sentences.en: The plane took off from the airport and headed northwards Zhengzhou.
sentences.cn: 飞机从机场起飞,往北向郑州方向飞去.

sentences.en: The road runs northwards, as straight as a die.
sentences.cn: 这条路笔直地向北延伸.

sentences.en: These birds migrate northwards in spring and southwards in fall.
sentences.cn: 这些鸟春天向北迁徙,秋天向南迁徙.

words.tran_cn: 北方的，向北的；来自北方的
